org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

Class ReplicationTrackerZKImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.ReplicationTrackerZKImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplicationTracker

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ReplicationTrackerZKImpl
extends Object
implements ReplicationTracker
    This class is a ZooKeeper implementation of the ReplicationTracker interface. This class is responsible for handling replication events that are defined in the ReplicationListener interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplicationTrackerZKImpl.OtherRegionServerWatcher
      Watcher used to be notified of the other region server's death in the local cluster.

      • getZNodeName

        private String getZNodeName(String fullPath)
        Extracts the znode name of a peer cluster from a ZK path
        Parameters:
        fullPath - Path to extract the id from
        Returns:
        the id or an empty string if path is invalid

      • refreshOtherRegionServersList

        private boolean refreshOtherRegionServersList(boolean watch)
        Reads the list of region servers from ZK and atomically clears our local view of it and replaces it with the updated list.
        Returns:
        true if the local list of the other region servers was updated with the ZK data (even if it was empty), false if the data was missing in ZK

      • getRegisteredRegionServers

        private List<String> getRegisteredRegionServers(boolean watch)
        Get a list of all the other region servers in this cluster and set a watch
        Returns:
        a list of server nanes
